page.text: "Hey star traveller. Can I ask like a huge favour of you?" the lizard smiles brightly, though as she continues to get it out her gaze lowers and she blushes "see I'm Suri and well, I'm not quite ready for breeding, but I kinda wanna feel what being a mom is like. Can I maybe...practice on you?"
"Oh uh, hi star traveller..have you changed your mind? I can't ask anyone else, and I really wanna know how it feels to hold another inside me like that."
"ooh, hi again. What can I do for ya?"

choice.text: Do you want to practice some more?

page.text:
You follow Suri out of view
and undress as Suri giggles and blushes

You can't help but agree, her warmth welcoming you as you push off against the ground with your feet. She can't see past the massive dome of her belly, now can she seem to keep her hands off of it as she draws you steadily the rest of the way inside of her womb. Her inexperienced sex seeming quite adept at tucking you away completely within her as your feet vanish between her thighs and she gasps in delight. "Ooh...ah, comfy in there? feels so good to have you. Hope you don't mind if I keep you in there for a while, I want to enjoy this."

The bulge in Suri's middle is treated good naturedly by the other villagers of Dammath as she hauls you around. Your form cradled snugly within her own for what's probably several hours as she enjoys doting on her taut tummy with strokes and pats now and then. It's during this period you find her warm softness luls you into sleep. Sometime later though you awaken to her clenching "ah, sorry. But I kinda wanna be slim again, hope you don't mind?" she says apologetically as she pushes you out exactly where you went in, your stuff still in the bushes nearby. Suri blushes as she rises to her feet and puts her skirt back on "It was fun though, I hope you enjoyed being womb filler for me." she says with a smile.

choice.text: It was fun suri, maybe we can do it again sometime

page.text: "Eh, already? eager one aren't you. It's not that I didn't enjoy having you in there, it's just can we do it a bit later?" she smiles apologetically, blushing as she turns your offer down.
"...mhmm, eager to get all tucked away inside my womb again hmm? Sure. Though I think this practice is starting to be more for your benefit than mine" she teases with a blush.

Suri blushes deeply as you tease her right back "stoppit." she protests, but smiles. It's clear that it appeals to her maternal instincts even if it does make her embarassed. She slips back into the bushes, slipping off her skirt again
as you undress and get ready as well
. Suri laying out and assuming the position, thighs spread, one hand tracing down between her legs to invite you into her warmth again "Mhmm, well then, come inside your momma" she says with a giggle, blushing a bit deeper as she tosses the word back at you and you work first one hand, then both of them, into her hot nethers. The lizard starting to chirr in delight as you work your hands all the way into her up as far as her womb, sliding your head into the heat of her inner embrace.

Suri's nethers tug gently around your shoulders and chest, drawing you into her warmth inch by inch with more ease than the first time. The lizard gasping, chirring and running a hand over her middle in delight as you begin to nestle into her warm insides. Her tail curling up around you lovingly as she clenches and tugs inside your middle, her own midriff stretching wonderfully as your upper body gets situated. Her warmth, her snug embrace, all of that washing over you as you try to tug your legs past her netherlips faster, wanting to curl up entirely inside this caring young lizard.

"mhmm eager aren't we." remarks Suri and moans, eyes slipping closed as she arches her back and tugs your legs inside. Your feet sliding up between her thighs, and disappearing as she clenches her legs together forcing them up past her netherlips. The lizard's womb encompassing you entirely yet again as you curl once more in her wonderfully snug embrace. Suri laying there chirring in delight and tracing a hand over her middle as gradually you settle inside her, lulled by the warmth, softness and the steady rthythm of her body around you.

The sight of Suri playing with her new friend again garners little more than doting smiles. Not that you would notice, encompassed entirely within the darkness of her womb you are asleep within her warmth in minutes. Your last waking thought before pleasant dreams have their say how nice the lizard is to heft you around like this and keep you warm and safe inside her. Time passing with her curling up in her own bed, protectively wrapped snuggling around the bulge of your form as she sleeps.

You awaken to the sensation of something different, but can't figure out quite what it is. Suri's attention is quickly garnered by your movements as you squirm around and try to feel over yourself to figure out the strange sensation. The lizard pausing what she's doing to glance down and rub a hand over her pregnant domed out middle "Mhmm, you're awfully restless, ready to be let out?" she asks and then takes your movements as assent and steps into the privacy of the bushes. The young yet motherly lizard squatting down and gasping as she tenses and squeezes you out steadily. Your form spilling out into the open air as she groans and lets out a chirr, and as you settle moistly onto the ground the change you felt earlier is revealed.
scales glistening on your limbs, dappling in scattered patches along your body. Suri's eyes widening in surprise "oh, ah, i didn't expect this to happen." she says and fidgets placing her fingers together "please tell me you're not mad?"

choice.text: It's okay, I kind of like it
Well this is an unwelcome surprise..

page.text:
You awaken to realize that you must of absorbed more saurian DNA from Suri while you were sleeping. As you can feel the somewhat familiar sensation of a change having been worked upon you while you slept. Feeling over your arms and legs you can feel smooth scales now covering almost the entirety of your limbs, You prod at the inside of the womb to get Suri's attention. The saurian settling with a bit of trepidation behind some bushes to squeeze back out. Your
new scales gleaming wetly in the light as Suri gasps and leans back blushing as you looks down at you and you stretch slowly "Mhmm, you know. I think you look cuter with scales." she says and reaches down to help you up. Suri is rather unapologetic, but then, you went in again after last time, you must like having more saurian genes. And Suri seems willing to gradually transform you into one of her own kind.

choice.text: I'll have to think about whether I want to go the whole way

page.text:
You're familiar by now with the sensation of waking up to changes inside the adorable Suri. But this change is more drastic than others, sharing space with an ample fleshy mass that turns out to be a part of you and anchored to your ass. A long lizardy tail of your own. Suri feels you squirming around and then giggles, eager to see what's happened this time she sways her way into the bushes and squats down with a smile. She gasps and mhmms and then shudders in delight as you push out of her headfirst, slowly easing out until you slip free, your long tail last to emerge and ooloured
like the rest of your scales that now cover all but your face and the front of your torso. You've fully gone native now it seems. Suri smiles and leans in to give you a smooch "I guess I made you one of us now, this was better than I could of imagined." she says and then gives your still damp form a hug, sliding hands down to stroke your tail before disentangling. Though Suri's grin probably isn't going away any time soon.

choice.text: It's one way to make friends I suppose.

page.text: You awaken sometime later, from the angle you can tell Suri is up and about and push out to get her attention. You hear her giggle around you and make her apologies to whatever muffled individuals she was interacting with before walking back to the bushes where your stuff was stashed. The naughty lizard patting her middle and then squatting down, the familiar clench and release of her insides pressing around you as gradually you're eased out into the world. Emerging headfirst into the cool air once more as she gasps and groans above you, squeezing you out inch by inch until your feet finally pop free of her sex. Suri taking a few moments to lick over you with a smile "Mhmm, hope you enjoyed. But I think that's enough inside time for you don't you?"

choice.text: for now yes, but perhaps later.
